item.title: Ticket #474 (Old version of Textile included in 1.3) created
item.dc:creator: Adam_M
item.description: Current nightlies of 1.3 include only Textile 1.0 plugin. Recommend inclusion of Adam Gessaman's latest version (currently 2.0.5 @ â€‹http://idly.org/2004/09/10/textile-205/).

item.title: Ticket #473 (Pings for future-dated posts should be sent at specified future date/time) created
item.dc:creator: Adam_M
item.description: Trackbacks and pingbacks for "future-dated" posts should be sent at the future date and time when the post is actually published.

item.title: Changeset [1869]: Make short tag long. Reported by adsworth.

item.description: Make short tag long. Reported by adsworth.

item.title: Changeset [1868]: Permalink love. Wrap mod_rewrite rules in a conditional. Make sure ...

item.description: Permalink love. Wrap mod_rewrite rules in a conditional. Make sure date permalinks are sane. Add get_year_link().

item.title: Ticket #472 (Delete button on draft does not delete) created
item.dc:creator: midrangeman
item.description: I started to create a new post, decided against it, clicked the delete button, but the post wasn't deleted.

item.title: Changeset [1867]: Actions shouldn't change around what they're passed

item.description: Actions shouldn't change around what they're passed

item.title: Changeset [1865]: Don't cache pages with DB errors.
item.dc:creator: saxmatt
item.description: Don't cache pages with DB errors.

item.title: Ticket #471 (Bug in wp_get_archives() call) created
item.dc:creator: cdturri
item.description: I just verified that the call to wp_get_archives() in index.php in WP 1.2.1. is hard-coding the value type=monthly ( wp_get_archives('type=monthly')). This causes the setting from the admin panel OPtions->Other Options-> archive_mode to be ignored.
